original_text: While they were walking down the mountain, Jesus said to the three disciples, ‘You must not tell anyone now about the things that you have just seen. One day, the Son of Man will die and then he will become alive again. Then you can tell people about these things.’
korean_text: 그들이 산에서 내려올 때에 예수께서 명하여 이르시되 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나기 전에는 본 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니

sentences.original_text: While they were walking down the mountain
Jesus said to the three disciples

sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 지금 아무에게도 말하지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: about the things that you have just seen
One day, the Son of Man will die
and then he will become alive again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그는 다시 살아날 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then you can tell people about these things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 이것들에 대해 사람들에게 말할 수 있다
